section.title: Door Information - Configuration Change Notifications
section.para: Door Information - Configuration Change Notifications section specifies Client ability to receive Doors configuration change notifications.

Feature Level Requirement:
section.para: Validated Feature: Door Information - Configuration Change Notifications (DoorConfigurationChangeNotifications)
Check Condition based on Device Features: Door Control Service is supported by Device.

listitem.para: Client subscribes to device messages using CreatePullPointSubscription operation to get Configuration Change notifications.
Client uses Pull Point event mechanism to retrieve notification events from Device.

Client is considered as supporting Configuration change notification if the following conditions are met:
Client supports EventHandling_Pullpoint feature (please see section) AND
Client supports DoorInformation_ListingOfDoors feature (please see section) AND
Client is able to retrieve tns1:Configuration/Door/Changed notification AND
Client is able to retrieve tns1:Configuration/Door/Removed notification.

Client is considered as NOT supporting Configuration change notification if ANY of the following is TRUE:
Client does not support EventHandling_Pullpoint feature (please see section) OR
Client does not support DoorInformation_ListingOfDoors feature (please see section) OR
Client unable to retrieve tns1:Configuration/Door/Changed notification OR
Client unable to retrieve tns1:Configuration/Door/Removed notification.
